Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.SubSceneController

Class LocalStationTabController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.GUIController
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.SubSceneController.LocalStationTabController
All Implemented Interfaces:
LocalModelListener, Listener, UI
public class LocalStationTabController extends GUIController implements LocalModelListener
A sub-scene controller. Manages inside a TabPane all Tab containing station view.
